Name: Complete Purchase Process with Multiple Options and Checkout
Description: Navigate to the home page, add items to the cart, select storage and purchase options. Proceed through the checkout steps by entering shipping and payment information, then complete the order.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on button AddToCart
Step 3: Click on label storageOptions (512GB)
Step 4: Click on label storageOptions (BlueTitanium)
Step 5: Click on button purchaseOptions (Increased)
Step 6: Click on button purchaseOptions (Buy)
Step 7: Click on button HotNewBestChoice
Step 8: Click on label storageOptions (Storage256GB)
Step 9: Click on label storageOptions (BlueTitanium)
Step 10: Click on button purchaseOptions (Increased2)
Step 11: Click on button purchaseOptions (Buy2)
Step 12: Hover over link GoToCart
Step 13: Click on link Unknown -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 14: Click on link GoToCart
Step 15: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 16: Hover over div object
Step 17: Click on input Email
Step 18: Enter input value in input Email
Step 19: Click on button ContinueToShipping
Step 20: Enter input value in input Email
Step 21: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 22: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
Step 23: Click on input FirstName
Step 24: Hover over div CheckoutInfo2
Step 25: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 26: Click on input LastName
Step 27: Hover over div CheckoutInfo3
Step 28: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 29: Click on input Address
Step 30: Hover over div CheckoutInfo4
Step 31: Enter input value in input Address
Step 32: Click on input ZipCode
Step 33: Hover over div CheckoutInfo5
Step 34: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 35: Click on input City
Step 36: Hover over div CheckoutInfo6
Step 37: Enter input value in input City
Step 38: Click on input State
Step 39: Hover over div CheckoutInfo7
Step 40: Enter input value in input State
Step 41: Click on input Phone
Step 42: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 43: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/payment'
Step 44: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/*'
Step 45: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
